settings.text:
Your dream of long hair no longer has to be a dream! Plantur 21 brings you a little bit closer to your #hairgoal day by day. Plantur 21 #longhair range increases your chance
of even longer hair and is free of silicones.

A daily supply of caffeine and micronutrients such as biotin, zinc and magnesium gives the hair a real energy boost. The right hair care routine is essential for long and strong hair. Styling and colouring or excessive heat from blow-drying and traightening stresses the hair and damage it from the outside. The silicone-free Nutri Conditioner contains conditioning agents such as cashmere to make your hair shiny and soft without weighing it down. Hair is easier to comb thanks to a more robust hair structure and smoother surface.

Use Plantur 21 to bring out the best of your hair â€“ for natural long hair
without extensions.

Above all else, long hair needs the right care if it is to look healthy and grow longer since it is susceptible to breakage and split ends.

In the process of growing your hair, it is often pushed to its limits: Styling and dyeing stress the hair, and rubbing back and forth against the shoulders, scarves or hair ties can cause breakage and split ends.

The right care routine is the key to strong, long hair.

settings.heading: These tips will help you achieve your goal:

settings.text:
Massage - A head massage stimulates the blood flow. This is good for hair growth.

Hair brush - The right brush is important when it comes to caring for your hair and preventing breakage while brushing. Therefore, get rid of your old, damaged brush as quickly as possible and invest in a high-quality brush.

Diet - Eating the right foods can also improve hair growth; a balanced and healthy diet is key to healthy hair. Polyunsaturated fatty acids, biotin, protein and zinc are particularly good nutrient suppliers.

Getting a trim - It may sound counterproductive, but it can help: Regularly visiting your hairdresser to have your ends trimmed keeps hair healthy, which allows it to grow better and fewer split ends develop. You should have your ends trimmed every 6 to 10 weeks.

Hormones - Hormones affect hair growth. If your hair is not gaining any length, this may be due to the pill. Talk to your doctor about this.

Materials - A smooth pillow cover (e.g. silk, satin) as well as dabbing instead of rubbing the hair dry after washing leads to less splitting and breakage. This gives your hair a better chance of growing.

settings.heading: How long do I have to use the Plantur 21 Products?
settings.row_content: In order to successfully strengthens the hair and to get longer healthier hair a regular and long-term application of the Plantur 21 products is necessary. The hair is exposed to high stress levels every single day and therefore require a continuous energy supply.

settings.heading: Can I also use the Plantur 21 Shampoo on bleached hair?
settings.row_content: Yes, the shampoo was also developed for externally stressed hair. It contains conditioning agents that repair the stressed hair without weighing down thin hair that lacks volume.

settings.heading: How do I apply the #longhair Conditioner correctly?
settings.row_content:
You should generally use a conditioning product to help your hair gain shine and to make brushing easier after washing it. The Conditioner was developed in a way that allows application after every wash without weighing the hair down.

Simply distribute a hazelnut-sized quantity throughout your wet hair and rinse out thoroughly after 30 seconds.

Works perfectly with the Plantur 21 #longhair Shampoo.

settings.heading: I have light hair and the Conditioner is pink. Will my hair get a pink tint with regular application?
settings.row_content: The included colour pigments are used in such small quantities that a colouring effect can be ruled out.
